snippet.title: (Ps3) - Inferno Pool Gameplay
snippet.description:
PlayStation Network download game
Has 8 ball, 9 ball, and Inferno Pool which in single player puts you against a clock and 24 balls that keep coming back up on to the table if you are not fast enough.  If you make enough then the pockets shoot flames.  In 2-4 player you can send your balls to other tables.

There are 4 tables, blue, red, purple, and grey and 6 different sets of balls for Inferno Pool.  Have to unlock 4 of the sets.  Has great physics and jump shots, and aiming line.  Can shoot your cue from overhead.  Can also turn down all the various music, menu, announcer volume settings.
